items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: Vertically stacked expandable and collapsible content sections for organizing dense information.

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Constrains content to a consistent width-to-height ratio for images, videos, or embeds.

items.name: alert-dialog
items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: Modal confirmation dialog for destructive or irreversible actions requiring user acknowledgement.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: User avatar displaying a profile image with a text or icon fallback.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Small status indicator or count label for highlighting categories, statuses, or counts.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Navigation breadcrumb trail showing the user's current location within a hierarchy.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants, sizes, and states.

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: Groups related buttons together with consistent spacing and connected styling.

items.name: calendar
items.title: Calendar
items.description: Interactive date calendar for browsing and selecting dates by month.

items.name: carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: Horizontally scrollable content carousel with navigation controls for browsing items.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Prominent message banner for displaying important information, warnings, or errors to users.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Structured container with header, content, and footer sections for grouping related information.

items.name: circular-progress
items.title: Circular Progress
items.description: Circular progress indicator for showing completion percentage in a ring format.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A toggle control for binary choices, supporting checked, unchecked, and indeterminate states.

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: Single expandable content section that toggles between collapsed and expanded states.

items.name: combobox
items.title: Combobox
items.description: Searchable dropdown with autocomplete for filtering and selecting from a list of options.

items.name: command
items.title: Command
items.description: A searchable command menu for quick actions, navigation, and filtering.

items.name: date-input
items.title: Date Input
items.description: Date picker input field for selecting dates with keyboard and calendar support.

items.name: description-list
items.title: Description List
items.description: Displays term-description pairs for presenting metadata, settings, or key-value information.

items.name: drawer
items.title: Drawer
items.description: Slide-out panel that emerges from screen edges for supplementary content or navigation.

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty
items.description: Empty state placeholder with icon and message for when no content is available.

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Contextual menu triggered by a button, with support for items, separators, and sub-menus.

items.name: field
items.title: Field
items.description: Form field wrapper that provides a label, description, and error message around a form control.

items.name: form
items.title: Form
items.description: A form wrapper component that provides consistent layout and validation support.

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: Generic list item primitive for building consistent list-based interfaces.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A form input field with consistent styling and focus states.

items.name: input-group
items.title: Input Group
items.description: Groups an input with adjacent buttons, icons, or text add-ons for combined input actions.

items.name: input-otp
items.title: Input OTP
items.description: One-time password input with individual digit slots for verification codes.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Inline keyboard shortcut display for showing key combinations and hotkeys.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: An accessible label component for form controls with optional description and error messages.

items.name: modal
items.title: Modal
items.description: A dialog overlay for focused interactions like confirmations, forms, and detail views.

items.name: native-select
items.title: Native Select
items.description: Native browser select dropdown for simple selection scenarios with optimal mobile support.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Page navigation controls for browsing through paginated content.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Floating content panel anchored to a trigger element for contextual information or controls.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Linear progress bar for visualizing completion or loading progress.

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of mutually exclusive options where only one can be selected at a time.

items.name: resizable
items.title: Resizable
items.description: Resizable panel layout that allows users to adjust the size of content areas by dragging handles.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: A dropdown control for selecting one or more options from a list.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: Range slider input for selecting a numeric value within a defined range.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Visual divider for separating content sections horizontally or vertically.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Animated placeholder shapes for previewing content layout while data is loading.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: Animated loading spinner for indicating indeterminate loading states.

items.name: stepper
items.title: Stepper
items.description: Multi-step progress indicator for guiding users through sequential workflows.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A toggle control for boolean states with smooth animation.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Structured data table with rows, columns, headers, and cells for displaying tabular data.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: Tabbed interface for organizing content into selectable panels.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: A multi-line text input for longer form content.

items.name: tag
items.title: Tag
items.description: Removable label element for displaying categories, filters, or selections.

items.name: tag-group
items.title: Tag Group
items.description: Managed group of tags with add and remove capabilities for multi-value selection.

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: Two-state toggle button that switches between pressed and unpressed states.

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: Group of toggle buttons where one or multiple options can be selected.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: Small floating label that appears on hover to provide additional descriptive text.

items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: Temporary notification messages that appear briefly to provide non-intrusive feedback.

items.description: A signup page with a card form and side-by-side password fields.

items.title: Profile Dropdown 01
items.description: A user profile dropdown with avatar, level progress, and navigation menu.
